name: Pimple Smack - Dirty and Nasty Popper
name_original: Pimple Smack - Dirty and Nasty Popper
description:
“Sticky but Addictive Game”
“When Nothing Else to do, Smack Pimples”
“Excellent Visual Effects”
____________________________________________

Here’s yet another simple but interesting game for you – Pimple Smack. Nobody likes that blackheads and white-spots. Now is the time to eliminate those pimples that make you look unattractive. Your only enemy in this game are pimples and you need click on them rapidly to get rid of them. The pimples you have to smack are on different faces!

So smack those nast and dirty pimples and moles from the face! We also offer you DIRTY MODE! A endless Pimple Smacker, to earn a lot of coins! With those coins you can buy new faces!

Pimple Smack is a very funny game with dirty pops, so enjoy the dirty popping!

+++GAME FEATURES+++
“Touch Sensor Game”
“Game is Simple, Just Pop a Pimple”
“Good for Killing Time”
